reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson explains concepts very clearly and is always willing to help during office hours. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures and engaging material, but grading can be a bit tough.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Challenging course with a lot of material. Dr. Carter is knowledgeable, but the exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Great storyteller! Makes history come alive, though there’s a lot of reading required.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: The class material is interesting, but Dr. Nguyen’s lectures can be monotonous and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is one of the best physics teachers I’ve had. He makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Very passionate about biology, but sometimes moves through the material too quickly.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson’s classes are always engaging. He encourages critical thinking and open discussions.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The course is well-structured, but Dr. White can be a bit harsh with her grading.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures, but some of the material can be abstract and difficult to grasp.

reviews.subject: Chemistry Lab
reviews.review: The lab is very time-consuming and Dr. Garcia expects a lot from her students.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. King’s classes are incredibly insightful. He challenges students to think about societal issues critically.

reviews.subject: Anatomy & Physiology
reviews.review: Dr. Collins is very knowledgeable, but the pace of the course is intense.

reviews.subject: Computer Science I
reviews.review: The content is good, but Prof. Clark’s teaching style can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is passionate about the subject and makes the material very relatable.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Art History
reviews.review: Interesting lectures with a lot of visual aids. However, the exams are harder than expected.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts is knowledgeable, but the class is very lecture-heavy and can be boring.

reviews.subject: Algebra
reviews.review: Decent class, but Prof. Lewis doesn’t always explain the concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Advanced Writing
reviews.review: Dr. Turner is an amazing professor. She provides detailed feedback that really helps improve your writing.

reviews.subject: Marketing 101
reviews.review: Good class with practical examples, but sometimes the assignments feel a bit repetitive.
